# Chasing Cloud Careers LLC

> Free tech education, mentorship, and training for aspiring cloud professionals.

## About

Chasing Cloud Careers LLC provides public speaking on technical education, mentorship, and tech bootcamp cohorts. We offer free self-service training materials and learning paths covering cloud computing, AI, and DevOps.

## Mission

- Free Training: All training materials and learning paths are completely free and self-service
- Hands-On Learning: Practical, project-based learning for real-world tech roles
- Mentorship: Guidance from experienced professionals in the tech industry
- Community: Tech bootcamp cohorts for collaborative learning

## Pages

- Home: https://chasingcloudcareersllc.github.io/
- Learning Paths: https://chasingcloudcareersllc.github.io/learn/
- Blog: https://chasingcloudcareersllc.github.io/blog/
